hanzi-su-wiki:
沢

Значения

Болото; множество, блеск

Мнемоника

Сокращение. Болото, где много воды 氵 и требуется надзор 尺, иначе можно утонуть.

Варианты

澤, 泽
purpleculture_pinyin:
zé
Japanese variant of 泽
Японский вариант Ze
rtega_mnemonic:
沢沢RSmarsh, swamp, grace, brilliance
  • watery 氵 place where one can put one's foot 尺
heisig_constituent: swamp, water, water droplets, water pistol, shaku-hachi, flag, stick
koohiiStory1: You´re hiding from the enemy underwater in a swamp. To breathe, you have your shakuhachi flute poking up through the surface of the water.
koohiiStory2: Sirens in the swamp play eerie music on their shakuhachi flutes to lure you in - you follow the enchanting music then its too late as you get trapped in the swamp!
kunYomi: さわ、うるお.い、うるお.す、つや
jp_example_words:
光沢(こうたく): brilliance, polish, lustre, glossy finish (of photographs)
贅沢(ぜいたく): luxury, extravagance
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: A tsunami of shrimp crashes into a swamp. Now the swamp is filled with shrimp. They used to live in the ocean, but the tsunami has carried them to their new home in the swamp.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine yourself in the swamp when the tsunami hits. Feel the water crash into you along with the shrimp. You’re all wet and shrimpy now.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Your house was right next to the swamp and on this side of your house you had many a tack (たく) there to hang things on. Now, on every tack there is skewered a shrimp. The force of the tsunami drove them into the tacks on the side of your house.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Look at the side of your house. It’s covered with shrimp that have been impaled on the tacks. Perfect for dinner.
Ru_Notes: Не путать: 択 (えらぶ、タク выбирать).
Kanshudo_mnemonic: a shaku (尺) of water (氵) is a marsh

Sawa
Name meaning
Nothing.
zé
яп. вм. 泽
Radicals: 氵, 尺  (tsunami, shrimp)
Meaning Mnemonic
A tsunami of shrimp crashes into a swamp. Now the swamp is filled with shrimp. They used to live in the ocean, but the tsunami has carried them to their new home in the swamp.
Imagine yourself in the swamp when the tsunami hits. Feel the water crash into you along with the shrimp. You’re all wet and shrimpy now.
Reading Mnemonic
Your house was right next to the swamp and on this side of your house you had many a tack (たく) there to hang things on. Now, on every tack there is skewered a shrimp. The force of the tsunami drove them into the tacks on the side of your house.
Look at the side of your house. It’s covered with shrimp that have been impaled on the tacks. Perfect for dinner.
